mapper.select: SELECT A.CODE_ID , A.CODE_VAL , IFNULL(B.TARGET_YN,'N') AS TARGET_YN FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SUM(TOT_EPRS_CNT) TOT_EPRS_CNT , ADVRTS_TP_CODE FROM BILLING.MOB_MEDIA_PAR_MTH_STATS WHERE STATS_MTH = CAST(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') AS INT) GROUP BY ADVRTS_TP_CODE ) Z ON CODE_ID = ADVRTS_TP_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_VAL, 'Y' AS TARGET_YN FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE WHERE CODE_TP_ID = 'ADVRTS_TP_CODE' AND CODE_ID IN ('04','10','16','17','34','37','40','41','42','47','49','50','54','55','56','57') ) AS B ON A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID AND A.CODE_VAL = B.CODE_VAL WHERE CODE_TP_ID = 'ADVRTS_TP_CODE' ORDER BY IFNULL(Z.TOT_EPRS_CNT,0) DESC , CODE_ID DESC ;
